arrow.description: Whether or not to display an arrow, including the configuration that points to the center of the element
arrow.description_zh: 是否显示箭头，包含是否指向元素中心的配置

placement.description: The position of the bootstrap card relative to the target element
placement.description_zh: 引导卡片相对于目标元素的位置

mask.description: Whether or not to enable the mask, you can also pass in the configuration to change the mask style and fill color
mask.description_zh: 是否启用蒙层，也可传入配置改变蒙层样式和填充色

type.description: Type, which affects the base color and text color
type.description_zh: 类型，影响底色与文字颜色

v-model:current.description: What step is it currently at

:scrollIntoViewOptions.description: Whether to support the current element to scroll into the window, you can also specify the relevant parameters of the scrolling window
:scrollIntoViewOptions.description_zh: 是否支持当前元素滚动到视窗内，也可传入配置指定滚动视窗的相关参数

events.name: change
events.description: Callback when the step changes. Current is the previous step
events.description_zh: Callback when the step changes. Current is the previous step

typeDetail.name: target
typeDetail.description: Get the element the guide card points to. Empty makes it show in center of screen

typeDetail.name: arrow
typeDetail.description: Whether to show the arrow, including the configuration whether to point to the center of the element

typeDetail.name: placement
typeDetail.type: left leftTop leftBottom right rightTop rightBottom top topLeft topRight bottom bottomLeft bottomRight
typeDetail.description: Position of the guide card relative to the target element

typeDetail.name: mask
typeDetail.description: Whether to enable masking, change mask style and fill color by pass custom props, the default follows the mask property of Tour

typeDetail.name: type
typeDetail.description: Type, affects the background color and text color

typeDetail.name: scrollIntoViewOptions
typeDetail.description: support pass custom scrollIntoView options, the default follows the scrollIntoViewOptions property of Tour
